SELECT * FROM ( SELECT MEMBER_SEQ, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NM, GROUP_SEQ, 0 AS COM_SEQ, '' AS COM_NM, LOGIN_YN, 'Y' AS CARALL FROM MC_MEMBER WHERE GROUP_SEQ=1 AND DEL_YN='N' UNION ALL SELECT a.SEQ AS MEMBER_SEQ, a.MEMBER_ID, a.MEMBER_PW, b.COM_NM AS MEMBER_NM, 3 AS GROUP_SEQ, b.SEQ AS COM_SEQ, b.COM_NM, a.LOGIN_YN, b.CARALL FROM NSH_COOPERATION_MEMBER a JOIN NSH_COOPERATION b ON B.DEL_YN='N' AND a.PARENT_SEQ = b.SEQ UNION ALL SELECT c.MEMBER_SEQ, c.MEMBER_ID, c.MEMBER_PW, c.MEMBER_NM, c.GROUP_SEQ, 0 as COM_SEQ, '' AS COM_NM, LOGIN_YN, 'N' AS CARALL FROM MC_MEMBER c WHERE c.GROUP_SEQ = 8 ) WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{member_id} AND MEMBER_PW = #{member_pw}
